Senior Data Engineer

1. Overview
   - As a Senior Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in driving the development and implementation of cutting-edge data solutions within our organization. You will lead a team of talented data engineers, collaborating closely with data scientists, analysts, and stakeholders to design and build scalable, high-performance data pipelines and infrastructure.
   - Your expertise in Java and Python, combined with your deep understanding of AI/ML principles, will be instrumental in developing and deploying advanced data-driven applications and intelligent agents.
   - This is an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact on the company's data-driven initiatives, shaping the future of our data ecosystem and driving innovation through data-centric solutions.

2. Responsibilities
   - Lead a team of data engineers, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment
   - Design and implement robust, scalable, and efficient data pipelines and infrastructure to support the organization's data-driven initiatives
   - Develop and deploy advanced AI/ML-powered data applications and intelligent agents, leveraging your expertise in Python and Java
   - Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into effective data solutions
   - Continuously optimize and enhance data processing workflows, ensuring high performance, reliability, and data quality
   - Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the data engineering field, and proactively identify opportunities for improvement and innovation
   - Mentor and guide junior data engineers, sharing your knowledge and expertise to foster their professional growth

3. Requirements
   - Extensive experience (8+ years) in data engineering, with a proven track record of leading successful data projects
   - Proficient in Java and Python, with a strong understanding of data processing frameworks, libraries, and tools
   - Expertise in designing and implementing scalable, fault-tolerant, and high-performance data pipelines and infrastructure
   - Hands-on experience in building and deploying AI/ML-powered data applications and intelligent agents
   - Solid understanding of data architecture patterns, data modeling, and data integration techniques
   - Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms, such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Microsoft Azure
   - Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions
   - Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams

4. Preferred Qualifications
   - Experience in leading and managing a team of data engineers
   - Proficiency in big data technologies, such as Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop, or Apache Kafka
   - Knowledge of data visualization and business intelligence tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
   - Experience in implementing data governance and data quality frameworks
   - Understanding of software engineering best practices, including version control, CI/CD, and testing
   - Strong analytical and critical thinking skills, with the ability to derive insights from complex data sets
   - Passion for staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the data engineering field

**Our Perks and Benefits:** 
Our benefits and rewards program has been thoughtfully designed to recognize your skills and contributions, elevate your learning/upskilling experience and provide care and support for you and your loved ones. 
 
As an Apexer, you get continuous skill-based development, opportunities for career advancement, and access to comprehensive health and well-being benefits and assistance.
 
**We also offer:**
1. Health Insurance with Dental & Vision
2. 401K Plan
3. Life Insurance, STD & LTD
4. Paid Vacations & Holidays
5. Paid Parental Leave
6. FSA Dependent & Limited Purpose care
7. Learning & Development
